name: gb-js-multi-emu-desktop
description: Desktop UI for GB JS Multi Emu

scripts.copy-resources: cp -r ./src/screens ./dist && cp -r ./src/styles ./dist && cp -r ./src/fonts ./dist && cp ./package.json ./dist && cp ./git_commit ./dist && cp -r ./src/assets ./dist
scripts.dev: npm run build-write-commit && npm run copy-resources && electron ./dist/main.js
scripts.build-write-commit: rm -f git_commit && echo $(git rev-parse HEAD) >> git_commit
scripts.build-release-linux: npm run clean-build && npm run build-typescript && npm run build-write-commit && npm run copy-resources && electron-packager . --out=./releases 'GB JS Multi Emu' --platform=linux --arch=x64 --ignore='src/.*' && cd ./releases; tar -Jcf 'GB JS Multi Emu-linux-x64.tar.xz' 'GB JS Multi Emu-linux-x64'
